references.paper_title: InstructPix2Pix: Learning to follow image editing instructions
references.reason: This paper introduces a foundational method for image editing based on instructions, which is a key concept extended upon in UniReal.
This paper is foundational for diffusion models, which form the basis of UniReal's approach to image generation and editing.

references.paper_title: Emerging properties in self-supervised vision transformers
references.reason: This paper details self-supervised vision transformers, which are a critical component of UniReal's architecture.

references.paper_title: Exploring the limits of transfer learning with a unified text-to-text transformer
references.reason: This paper introduces the T5 text encoder, which UniReal uses for processing text prompts.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper provides a high-resolution approach to image synthesis, which is relevant to UniReal's goal of generating high-quality images.
